txt.en: The summer sun warms you, let the festivities begin!

The beautiful summer days and mild nights have everyone in a festive mood! Start your Summer Festival celebrations at the Party Tree.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>After accepting this quest, you will get a map. Use the map to travel to the Party Tree and join in the Festival.</rgb>

Summer is in full swing, with lazy afternoons at the fishing hole, outdoor party games and feasting in the open air.   Every race celebrates in their own way and knows this festival by a different name, but all revel in delights of a fine summer's day!\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>After accepting this quest, you will get a map. Use the map to travel to the Party Tree and join in the Festival.</rgb>

The revellers at the Party Tree await!  Join them and enjoy the festivities.  Summer is here!\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>After accepting this quest, you will get a map. Use the map to travel to the Party Tree and join in the Festival.</rgb>
Travel to the Party tree to participate in the Summer Festival
Travel to the the Party Tree

Summer is in full swing, with lazy afternoons at the fishing hole, outdoor party games and feasting in the open air.   Every race celebrates in their own way, and knows this festival by a different name, but all revel in delights of a fine summer's day!\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
The beautiful summer days and mild nights have everyone in a festive mood! Start your Summer Festival celebrations at the Party Tree.
